name: reldmsets

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, csts, universe, universe, cun(cres(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdm(csn(cv(hs1))))), csn(cv(hs1))))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, csts, universe, universe, ((hs0 |`(𝕌 \ dom({ hs1 })))⋃ { hs1 }))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(csts))
-| wceq(csts, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cun(cres(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdm(csn(cv(hs1))))), csn(cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(sSet))
⊣ sSet =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((hs0 |`(𝕌 \ dom({ hs1 })))⋃ { hs1 }))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, 𝕌)
